name: cy_BONES
description:
WHATS INSIDE?

>< Augmented fighters to hack and adapt

>< Resources for boxing scenarios in Cy

>< GM guidance for bouts in any environment

spotify playlist ⬇


       ⬆ bout inspiration

This pamphlet is a game master tool for adding hydraulic-powered boxing into your games without stretching melee combat too far. \\

This is a living document that we plan to expand on in the future with a zine. \\

Send questions to nlazar96@gmail.com & me@calenheydt.com

cy_Bones is an independent production by Calen Heydt & Nick Lazar and is not affiliated with Stockholm Kartell. It is published under the CY_BORG Third Party License.
